family_oriented.reason: The activities are more suited for older children and adults, focusing on storytelling and historical exploration.

history_oriented.reason: The tour emphasizes history with engaging storytelling and lesser-known historical aspects.

activity_oriented.reason: The tour involves walking and listening, with low physical activity.

nature_oriented.reason: There is no focus on natural scenery or outdoor elements.

food_oriented.reason: No food-related aspects are part of the tour.

shopping_oriented.reason: No shopping opportunities are mentioned during the tour.
